item.description:
The Fatherhood Coalition will sponsor a Pro Se Workshop, Saturday, June 26, 9:00-5:00 p.m. at The Zion Lutheran Church, 41 Whitmarsh Ave., Worcester.

The workshop will help you prepare your case during and after divorce, separation and custody proceedings. Learn about how to file various legal instruments, rules of the court and about the players. The workshop is free of charge to CPF members or for those who commit to volunteer a couple of hours of their time in court support/watching or similar activity. A cash donation of $20 in lieu of volunteer time is acceptable.

Register on line here: http://www.fatherhood...

For more information, Wayne by e-mail at nuhusky82@aol.com.

group.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition

item.name: Pro se Workshop for Men and Fathers in Divorce
